MemberSignature.Value: public virtual Azure.Response GetModelInfo (Azure.RequestContext context);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class Azure.Response GetModelInfo(class Azure.RequestContext context) cil managed
Public Overridable Function GetModelInfo (context As RequestContext) As Response
abstract member GetModelInfo : Azure.RequestContext -> Azure.Response override this.GetModelInfo : Azure.RequestContext -> Azure.Response

Docs.param: The request context, which can override default behaviors of the client pipeline on a per-call basis.
Docs.summary:
[Protocol Method] Returns information about the AI model. The method makes a REST API call to the `/info` route on the given endpoint. This method will only work when using Serverless API or Managed Compute endpoint. It will not work for GitHub Models endpoint or Azure OpenAI endpoint.
This protocol method allows explicit creation of the request and processing of the response for advanced scenarios.
Please try the simpler convenience overload with strongly typed models first.
Docs.returns: The response returned from the service.
Docs.exception: Service returned a non-success status code.
